name: Treehouse Trouble
description:
This is a game we made for the 2019 Global Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "What home means to you",  which we interpreted as childhood playtime in your backyard. 

Gameplay 

This game is meant to be played by two players. Defend your awesome treehouse against waves of spooky monsters. 

ControlsPlayer 1Player 2MoveWASDArrow KeysAttackRPCycle ItemsTO Credits
